summary: Add a new video section showcasing 'Glass Half Empty' video between the Experience and Contact sections. The implementation will use HTML5 video element with custom controls, glass-morphism styling to match the portfolio theme, and integrate with existing scroll animations and navigation system.

action_plan.description: Add video navigation link to navbar menu
Create new video section HTML structure between Experience and Contact sections with HTML5 video element, title, description, and glass-morphism container
Add video section CSS styling including glass-morphism background, responsive video sizing, custom play/pause button overlay, and mobile responsiveness
Integrate video section with existing JavaScript scroll animations and fade-in effects
Add custom video controls JavaScript for enhanced play/pause functionality and user experience
Test video section responsiveness and ensure proper integration with existing portfolio animations and navigation

risks: Video file size (16MB) may cause slow loading on slower connections
Non-HD video quality may not look optimal on high-resolution displays
Video autoplay policies in browsers may prevent automatic playback
Mobile video performance and bandwidth considerations
dependencies: Existing glass_half_empty.mov file in static/videos/ directory
Current CSS custom properties and glass-morphism theme variables
Existing JavaScript scroll animation and fade-in system
Responsive grid layout system already in place
issue_title: Feature Request: Add video section with playable 'Glass Half Empty' video
